content.rendered:
This page contains a list of every TM & HM found in Pokemon Unbound. We’ve included the exact location and a screenshot for each one.

You can also click any TM/HM name in the tables below to visit a dedicated wiki page with more details on that specific TM or HM.

List of All HMs

HM Location Description Type Total PP Screenshot
HM01 Cut KBT Expressway

Given by a mountain climber NPC in the KBT Expressway South of Crater Town. 		A basic attack that can be used to cut down thin trees and grass. Normal 30
HM02 Fly Fallshore City – Outside the Gym

Given by Mel outside of the Fallshore City Gym after defeating him and exiting. 		A 2-turn move that hits the target on the second turn. Use it to fly to any known town. Flying 15
HM03 Surf Route 12

Given by your rival on Route 12 after acquiring the ability to Mega Evolve your Pokémon. 		A big wave crashes down on the foe. Can also be used for crossing waters. Water 15
HM04 Strength Epidimy Town – West-most house

Given by the NPC inside of the West-most house in Epidimy Town. 		The foe is slugged at maximum power. Can also be used to move boulders. Normal 15
HM05 Dive Seaport City – Captain Davy’s Shipyard

After beating the Elite Four and becoming champion, go to Captain Davy’s Shipyard in Seaport City and buy the ADM from him for 250,000 Pokémon Dollars. He’ll give you the HM for Dive too. 		The user dives underwater the first turn and attacks the next turn. Water 10
HM06 Rock Smash Blizzard City – North-most house

Given by the Mountain Climber NPC in Blizzard City. You can find him on the ground floor of the house east of the KBT Expressway entrance. 		An attack that lowers defense. It can also be used to smash cracked boulders. Fighting 15
HM07 Waterfall Polder Town – Gym

Given as a reward for defeating Tessy at the Polder Town Gym. 		A powerful charge attack. It can also be used to climb a waterfall. Water 15
HM08 Rock Climb Route 17

Given by the construction worker NPC on Route 17. 		A charging attack that may confuse the foe. Can also be used to scale walls. Rock 20

List of All TMs

TM Location Description Type Total PP Screenshot
TM001 Focus Punch Victory Road – Maze area

Found in the Victory Road hedge maze area. The TM is hidden behind a hedge wall. 		An attack that is executed last. The user flinches if hit beforehand. Fighting 20
TM002 Dragon Claw Victory Road – Snowy area

Found in the snowy cliff area of Victory Road. It’s in the far east side that requires you to use Rock Climb to reach. 		Sharp, huge claws hook and slash the foe quickly and with great power. Dragon 15
TM003 Water Pulse Valley Cave

Inside Valley Cave, North of the giant stone tablet and the Gentleman Thomas NPC. 		An attack with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the enemy. Water 20
TM004 Calm Mind Fallshore City – TM Merchant

Bought from the TM merchant in Fallshore City for 10,000 Poké Dollars. 		The user focuses its mind to raise the special attack and special defense stats. Psychic 20
TM005 Roar Crystal Peak 1F

Found in Crystal Peak 1F. The TM is east of the ladder leading to the ground floor and requires Surf 		The foe is made to switch out of battle with an ally. In a wild battle, the battle instantly ends. Normal 20
TM006 Toxic Cootes Bog

Found in the east part of Cootes Bog. Requires Surf. 		A move that badly poisons the foe. Its poison damage worsens every turn. Poison 10
TM007 Hail Icy Hole

Given by the clown in the Icy Hole South of Bellin Town after pushing him off of the slippery ice area. 		A hailstorm lasting five turns damages all Pokémon except the Ice-type. Ice 10
TM008 Bulk Up Fallshore City – TM Merchant

Bought from the TM merchant in Fallshore City for 10,000 Poké Dollars. 		The user bulks up its body to boost both its attack and defense stat. Fighting 20
TM009 Bullet Seed Route 5

Found on Route 5 by taking the path blocked by the cuttable tree near the Crater Town entrance. 		The user shoots seeds at the foe. Two to five seeds are shot at once. Grass 30
TM010 Hidden Power Fallshore City – East house

Given by the Ace Trainer NPC inside of the house in Fallshore City West of the path leading to Route 11. 		A unique attack that varies in type depending on the user. Normal 15
TM011 Sunny Day Route 16

Given by the clown found in the western part of Route 16 after showing him Solrock or Solgaleo. 		The sun blazes for five turns, powering up fire-type moves. Fire 5
TM012 Taunt Seaport City

Hidden behind the Seaport City Pokémon Mart. 		The foe is taunted into a rage that only allows it to use attack moves. Dark 20
TM013 Ice Beam Icicle Cave

Found in a small area in Icicle Cave 4F that requires you to Surf to a hidden ladder on the third floor to reach. 		The foe is struck with an icy beam. It may leave the foe with frostbite. Ice 10
TM014 Blizzard Icicle Cave

Found in the Icicle Cave B1F slippery ice area. Requires you to push a bolder down first to retrieve the TM. 		A blizzard strikes the opposing team. It may leave them with frostbite. Ice 5
TM015 Hyper Beam Dehara City – Department Store

Bought from the Dehara City Department Store 4F for 50,000 Pokémon Dollars. 		A severely damaging attack that makes the user rest on the next turn. Normal 5
TM016 Light Screen Dehara City – Game Corner

Can be acquired in the Dehara City Game Corner for 2,000 Coins. 		A wall of light cuts damage from special attacks for five turns. Psychic 30
TM017 Protect Fallshore City – TM Merchant

Bought from the TM merchant in Fallshore City for 10,000 Poké Dollars. 		Enables the user to evade all attacks. It may fail if used in succession. Normal 10
TM018 Rain Dance Auburn Waterway

Given by the clown at Auburn Waterway after finding him near the center. Requires Surf to reach him. 		A heavy rain falls for five turns, powering up water-type moves. Water 5
TM019 Giga Drain Redwood Forest

Found in Redwood Forest, just east of the exit that leads to Cube Corp. 		A harsh attack that absorbs half the damage it inflicts to restore HP. Grass 10
TM020 Safeguard Battle Tower – TM counter

Can be traded in the Battle Tower TM counter for 16 Battle Points. 		It protects the user’s party from all status problems for five turns. Normal 25
TM021 Frustration Tomb of Borrius

Found in the Tomb of Borrius B1F, in the room where you have to use your motorcycle to progress. 		This attack move grows more powerful the less the user likes its trainer. Normal 20
TM022 Solar Beam Magnolia Fields

Found in the southern part of Magnolia Fields that’s reachable using Surf. It’s hidden behind some trees. 		A 2-turn move that blasts the foe with absorbed energy in the second turn. Grass 10
TM023 Iron Tail Route 14

Found on a small patch of land on Route 14. Reachable using the ADM to use the dive spot in front of the Ruins of Void. 		An attack with a steel-hard tail. It may lower the foe’s defense stat. Steel 15
TM024 Thunderbolt Thundercap Mountain – Near Entrance

Found in Thundercap Mountain, directly in front of the Epidimy Town entrance. Requires Surf. 		A strong electrical attack that may also leave the foe paralyzed. Electric 15
TM025 Thunder Thundercap Mountain – Peak

Found on the far east side of Thundercap Mountain’s peak. Requires Rock Climb to reach. 		A brutal lightning attack that may also leave the foe paralyzed. Electric 10
TM026 Earthquake The Great Dessert

Found directly above the Tomb of Borrius in the Great Desert. Requires both Rock Smash and Rock Climb. 		An earthquake that strikes all Pokémon in battle excluding the user. Ground 10
TM027 Return Blizzard City – East-most house

Given as a reward for completing “Bad Babysitter.” 		This attack move grows stronger the more the Pokémon likes its trainer. Normal 20
TM028 Dig Auburn Waterway

Given as a reward for completing “Island Saviour.” 		An attack that hits on the second turn. Can also be used to exit dungeons. Ground 10
TM029 Psychic Fallshore City

Found east of the Fallshore City KBT Expressway entrance. Requires Waterfall to reach. 		A strong telekinetic attack. It may also lower the foe’s special defense stat. Psychic 10
TM030 Shadow Ball Route 9

Found on an island on Route 9 in the middle of the lake. 		A shadowy blob is hurled at the foe. It may also lower the foe’s special defense. Ghost 15
TM031 Brick Break Ruins of Void

Found behind some smashable rocks inside the Ruins of Void. 		An attack that also breaks any barrier like Light Screen and Reflect. Fighting 15
TM032 Double Team Dehara City – Game Corner

Can be acquired in the Dehara City Game Corner for 3,000 Coins. 		The user creates illusory copies of itself to raise evasiveness. Normal 15
TM033 Reflect Dehara City – Game Corner

Can be acquired in the Dehara City Game Corner for 2,000 Coins. 		A wall of light cuts damage from physical attacks for five turns. Psychic 20
TM034 Shockwave Blizzard City – Poké Mart

Bought from the Blizzard City Poké Mart for 10,000 Poké Dollars. 		A rapid jolt of electricity strikes the foe. It can’t be evaded. Electric 20
TM035 Flamethrower Cinder Volcano

Found on the east side of Cinder Volcano 1F. Requires Surf and a fire-type Pokemon. 		The foe is scorched with intense flames. The foe may suffer a burn Fire 15
TM036 Sludge Bomb Antisis City – Sewers

Found in the flooded area of the Antisis Sewer. Requires Surf and Waterfall to reach. 		Filthy sludge is hurled at the foe. It may poison the target. Poison 10
TM037 Sandstorm Great Dessert

Rewarded by the clown in the Great Dessert after destroying all of the required smashable rocks. 		A 5-turn sandstorm that damages all Pokémon types except Ground, Rock, and Steel. Rock 10
TM038 Fire Blast Cinder Volcano

Found on the Cinder Volcano 3F’s east side. Requires Rock Climb. 		The foe is hit with an intense flame. It may leave the target with a burn. Fire 5
TM039 Rock Tomb Blizzard City – Poké Mart

Bought from the Blizzard City Poké Mart for 10,000 Poké Dollars. 		Boulders are hurled at the foe. It also lowers the foe’s speed if it hits. Rock 15
TM040 Aerial Ace Blizzard City – Gym

Given as a reward for defeating Alice at the Blizzard City Gym. 		An extremely fast attack against one target that can’t be evaded. Flying 20
TM041 Torment Shadow Base B2F

Found behind a door requiring a level 3 Key Card in the Shadow Base B2F. 		It enrages the foe, making it incapable of performing the same move successfully. Dark 15
TM042 Facade Fallshore City – Gym

Given as a reward for defeating Mel at the Fallshore City Gym. 		An attack that is boosted if the user is burned, poisoned, or paralyzed. Normal 20
TM043 Secret Power Dehara City – Game Corner

Can be acquired in the Dehara City Game Corner for 3,000 Coins. 		An attack that may have an additional effect that varies with the terrain. Normal 20
TM044 Rest Crater Town – Valley Cave

Found in the Crater Town Valley Cave B1F directly north of the ladder leading out of the cave. Requires Surf. 		The user sleeps for two turns to fully restore HP and any status problems. Psychic 10
TM045 Attract Route 3

On a small island with a fisherman on the east side of Route 3. Requires Surf to reach. 		If it is the other gender, the foe is made infatuated and unlikely to attack. Normal 15
TM046 Thief Crater Town – Gym

Given as a reward for defeating Vega at the Crater Town Gym. 		An attack that may take the foe’s held item if the user isn’t holding one. Dark 25
TM047 Steel Wing Route 12

Found on the East side of Route 12 when going from Dehara City to Tarmigan Town. 		The foe is hit with wings of steel. It may also raise the user’s defense. Steel 25
TM048 Skill Swap Outside of the Ruins of Void

Found on the east side of the Ruins of Void Mountain. It can be reached using the ADM gear west of the entrance. 		The user employs its psychic powers to swap abilities with the opponent. Psychic 10
TM049 Leech Fang Redwood Village – Gym

Given as a reward for defeating Benjamin at the Redwood Village Gym. 		An attack that restores half the damage it inflicted to restore HP. Bug 10
TM050 Overheat Crystal Peak

Found in the East part of the Crystal Peak 1F. The red and blue crystals should be powered off. 		An intense attack that also reduced the user’s special attack stat. Fire 5
TM051 Roost Route 13

Found on a small rocky island on Route 13. Requires both Surf and Rock Climb. 		A self-healing move that restores health by up to half of the user’s maximum HP. Flying 10
TM052 Focus Blast Dehara City – Department Store

Bought from the Dehara City Department Store 4F for 30,000 Pokémon Dollars. 		The user unleashes its power. It may also lower the foe’s special defense. Fighting 5
TM053 Energy Ball Seaport City – TM Merchant

Bought from the Seaport City TM merchant for 20,000 Poké Dollars. 		The foe is blasted with natural energy. It may also lower the foe’s special defense. Grass 10
TM054 False Swipe Route 10

Found behind a wooden fence on the east side of Route 10. 		A restrained attack that always leaves the foe with at least one HP. Normal 40
TM055 Brine Blizzard City – Poké Mart

Bought from the Blizzard City Poké Mart for 10,000 Poké Dollars. 		If the foe’s HP is down to half, this attack does double damage. Water 10
TM056 Hone Claws Icicle Cave – Hidden Area

Given as a reward for completing “The Food Thief.” 		The user sharpens its claws to raise its attack and accuracy. Dark 15
TM057 Charge Beam Seaport City – TM Merchant

Bought from the Seaport City TM merchant for 10,000 Poké Dollars. 		The user fires a load of electricity that may raise the user’s special attack. Electric 10
TM058 Endure Battle Tower – TM counter

Can be traded in the Battle Tower TM counter for 24 Battle Points. 		The user endures any hit with 1 HP left. It may fail if used in succession. Normal 10
TM059 Dragon Pulse Route 18

Found on Route 18, on the path behind the Pokémon Center that’s blocked by three small trees you have to use Cut on. 		The foe is attacked by a shockwave generated by the user’s gaping mouth. Dragon 10
TM060 Drain Punch Antisis City – Gym

Given as a reward for defeating Big Mo at the Antisis City Gym. 		A harsh punch that restores half of the damage it deals to restore HP. Fighting 10
TM061 Will-O-Wisp Dehara City – Game Corner

Can be acquired in the Dehara City Game Corner for 4,000 Coins. 		A sinister bluish-white flame is shot at the foe to inflict a burn. Fire 15
TM062 Silver Wind Flower Paradise

Given as a reward for completing “Honey Gather.” 		The foe is attacked with a silver dust. It may raise all the user’s stats. Bug 5
TM063 Venoshock Blizzard City – Poké Mart

Bought from the Blizzard City Poké Mart for 10,000 Poké Dollars. 		The foe is soaked by a special acid. The attack’s damage is doubled if the foe is poisoned. Poison 10
TM064 Explosion Dehara City – Department Store

Bought from the Dehara City Department Store 4F for 40,000 Pokémon Dollars. 		The user explodes to deal terrible damage even while fainting itself. Normal 5
TM065 Shadow Claw Route 11

Found on Route 11. The TM is on a cliff that requires Rock Climb to reach. 		Claws made of shadows rake the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio. Ghost 15
TM066 Payback Route 4

Found on the west part of Route 4, directly north of the Grim Woods entrance. Requires Cut. 		If the user moves after the target, this attack’s power will be doubled. Dark 10
TM067 Recycle Antisis City – Sewers

Found in the northern part of the Antisis City Sewers area. 		A move that recycles a used item for use once more. Normal 10
TM068 Giga Impact Dehara City – Department Store

Bought from the Dehara City Department Store 4F for 50,000 Pokémon Dollars. 		A severely damaging attack that makes the user rest on the next turn. Normal 5
TM069 Rock Polish Icicle Cave

In the Icicle Cave’s B1F, at the bottom-right corner of the slippery ice puzzle. 		The user polishes its body to sharply boost its speed. Rock 20
TM070 Flash Crater Town – Poké Mart

Given by the blonde NPC sitting near the table in the Crater Town Poké Mart. 		A blast of light that cuts the foe’s accuracy. It also illuminates caves. Normal 20
TM071 Stone Edge Crystal Peak

Found in the Crystal Peak 1F, near the entrance to Cube Corp. It requires Rock Climb and the yellow crystals should be powered off. 		The foe is stabbed by sharpened stones. It has a high critical-hit ratio. Rock 5
TM072 Avalanche Frost Mountain

The TM is in Frost Mountain 2F, reachable by taking the incorrect ladder to the second floor. 		An attack move that gains in intensity if the target has hurt the user. Ice 10
TM073 Thunder Wave Thundercap Mountain

Given as a reward for completing “The Wayward Kid.” 		A weak electric shock that is sure to cause paralysis if it hits. Electric 20
TM074 Gyro Ball Route 6

Found on Route 6, directly west of the path leading to Route 14. Requires Surf and Rock Climb. 		A high-speed spin. The slower the user is than the foe the greater the damage. Steel 5
TM075 Swords Dance Dehara City – Game Corner

Can be acquired in the Dehara City Game Corner for 4,000 Coins. 		A frenetic dance of fighting. It sharply raises the attack stat. Normal 20
TM076 Stealth Rock Cinder Volcano B1F – West room

Found behind some smashable and pushable rocks inside a room west of Cinder Volcano B1F. 		Levitating rocks are laid around the foe’s party to hurt foes switching in. Rock 20
TM077 Flame Charge Autl Woods

In Autl Woods, south of the path leading to the house that has the underground path. You need to have Surf to reach the TM and it’s hidden behind a tree. 		The user cloaks itself in flames and attacks. It also increases the user’s speed. Fire 20
TM078 Low Sweep Blizzard City – Poké Mart

Bought from the Blizzard City Poké Mart for 10,000 Poké Dollars. 		The user attacks the foe’s legs, lowering its speed stat. Fighting 20
TM079 Dark Pulse Frost Mountain 1F

Found west of the Frost Mountain main entrance. Requires Rock Climb. 		The user releases a horrible aura that may also make the target flinch. Dark 15
TM080 Rock Slide Frost Mountain

Found on Frost Mountain 2F, east of the ladder going to the first floor and under a bridge. Requires Rock Climb. 		Large boulders are hurled at the foe. It may make the foe flinch. Rock 10
TM081 X-Scissor Vivill Woods

Found in the South-West side of Vivill Woods. It requires Surf and is hidden by some trees. 		The user slashes the foe with crossed claws as if they were scissors. Bug 15
TM082 Sleep Talk Dehara City – Game Corner

Can be acquired in the Dehara City Game Corner for 4,000 Coins. 		While asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows. Normal 10
TM083 Scald Route 14

Found on Route 14, in the North part of the island closest to Route 6. Requires Rock Climb. 		Boiling water is shot at the foe. It may also cause a burn. Water 15
TM084 Poison Jab Seaport City – TM Merchant

Bought from the Seaport City TM merchant for 20,000 Poké Dollars. 		The foe is stabbed by an arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the foe. Poison 20
TM085 Dream Eater Tarmigan Town – Dream Research Lab

Given by the scientist with the red glasses inside the Tarmigan Town Dream Research Lab. 		Absorbs half the damage it inflicted on a sleeping foe to restore HP. Psychic 15
TM086 Grass Knot Dresco Town – Gym

Given as a reward for defeating Mirskle at the Dresco Town Gym. 		Grass snares and trips the foe. It does more damage to heavier foes. Grass 20
TM087 Swagger Dehara City – Game Corner

Can be acquired in the Dehara City Game Corner for 2,000 Coins. 		A move that makes the foe confused but also sharply raises its attack. Normal 15
TM088 Pluck Blizzard City – Poké Mart

Bought from the Blizzard City Poké Mart for 10,000 Poké Dollars. 		The user pecks the foe, plucking its berry if it’s holding one. Flying 20
TM089 U-Turn Auburn Waterway

Found on an island in the Auburn Waterway reachable by using Surf. 		After attacking, the user switches places with a party Pokemon. Bug 20
TM090 Substitute Battle Tower – TM counter

Can be traded in the Battle Tower TM counter for 32 Battle Points. 		The user creates a decoy using one-quarter of its full HP. Normal 10
TM091 Flash Cannon Thundercap Mountain

In a small area found on the second floor of Thundercap Mountain. Requires Rock Climb, Rock Smash, Surf, and Strength to reach. 		Light energy is shot at the foe. It may also lower the foe’s special defense. Steel 10
TM092 Volt Switch Dehara City – Gym

Given as a reward for defeating Galavan at the Dehara City Gym. 		After attacking, the user switches places with a party Pokemon. Electric 20
TM093 Dragon Tail Rift Cave – Maze area

Found in the Rift Cave’s maze area. The area can be accessed after completing the post-game mission and picking up the “A Rift in Space” mission. 		The foe is made to switch out with an ally. In the wild, the battle ends. Dragon 10
TM094 Incinerate Cinder Volcano – 3F

Found in Cinder Volcano 3F, next to the dead end leading to the battle girl trainer. 		The user burns the foe completely, rendering a held Gem or Berry useless. Fire 15
TM095 Struggle Bug Route 6

Found in between two ledges on Route 7 reachable after beating the Sun Trio 		While resisting, the user attacks the foe, lowering its special attack stat. Bug 20
TM096 Bulldoze Blizzard City – Poké Mart

Bought from the Blizzard City Poké Mart for 10,000 Poké Dollars. 		The user hits all Pokemon by stomping. Lowers the speed of those that get hit. Ground 20
TM097 Frost Breath Bellin Town

Next to the top-right house in Bellin Town. Requires Rock Climb. 		The user blows cold air at the foe. It always results in a critical hit. Ice 10
TM098 Work Up Crater Town – Bottom-left house

Given as a reward for completing “The Black Emboar.” 		The user rouses itself to raise its attack and special attack stats. Normal 30
TM099 Wild Charge Seaport City – Abandoned warehouse

Found inside a warehouse in Seaport City. The warehouse is accessed during the “The Rogue Electivire” side mission. 		The user throws an electrified tackle. It hurts the user a little. Electric 15
TM100 Infestation Grim Woods – North side

Found at the end of the path directly north of the entrance facing Dresco Town. 		The foe is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can’t flee during this. Bug 20
TM101 Power-Up Hit Valley Cave

Found on the South side of the Valley Cave, directly next to a stone tablet. The tablet can be destroyed by interacting with a rock west of the Pokémon Ranger NPC while having a bug Pokémon in your party’s first slot. 		Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s fists harder. Raises the attack stat. Fighting 20
TM102 Dazzle Gleam Redwood Village

Found in Redwood Village, south of the house with the two breeders. The TM is hidden behind a tree. 		The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash. Fairy 10
TM103 Sludge Wave Battle Tower – TM counter

Can be traded in the Battle Tower TM counter for 48 Battle Points. 		The area around the user is swamped by a giant sludge wave. It may also poison those hit. Poison 10
TM104 Psyshock Route 17

Found on Route 17, near Seaport City. Requires Rock Climb. 		An odd psychic wave attacks the target. This attack does physical damage. Psychic 10
TM105 Brutal Swing Dresco Town

Found under the bridges in Dresco Town. Requires Surf to reach. 		The user swings its body violently to attack everything around it. Dark 20
TM106 Smart Strike Fallshore City – Mission HQ

This TM is a reward for completing “The Terror Granbull.” 		The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses. Steel 10
TM107 Acrobatics Antisis City – Southwestern house

Given by the NPC inside the house at the bottom-left corner of Antisis City after showing him a Pokemon with Eerie Impulse. 		The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage. Flying 15
TM108 Snarl Route 7 – Near Frost Mountain

Found East of the entrance to Frost Mountain On Route 7. 		The user barks menacingly. It also lowers the foe’s special attack. Dark 15
TM109 Defog Antisis City – Sewers

Given by the clown in the flooded area of the Antisis Sewer after showing him a Pokémon with Sweet Scent. 		A strong wind blows away the target’s obstacles. It also lowers the target’s evasiveness. Flying 15
TM110 Drain Kiss Vivill Warehouse – Drowned section

Can be found in the drowned area of the Vivill Warehouse. Requires the ADM. 		A sweet kiss that absorbs over half the damage inflicted to restore HP. Fairy 10
TM111 Smack Down Gurun Town – Northwest house

Given as a reward for completing “As Hard as They Come.” 		A projectile is thrown at the opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground. Rock 15
TM112 Round Route 2

Found on Route 2, behind some cuttable trees and next to a mountain climber NPC. 		The user attacks with a song. Others can join in to deal more damage. Normal 10
TM113 Echoed Voice Dehara City – Game Corner

Can be acquired in the Dehara City Game Corner for 2,000 Coins. 		The user attacks the target with a harsh echo. If used every turn, power increases. Normal 15
TM114 Natural Gift Seaport City – Marketplace

Gifted by the yellow-haired NPC in the Seaport City Marketplace. 		The type and base power of this move is determined by the user’s Berry. Normal 15
TM115 Quash Battle Tower – TM counter

Can be traded in the Battle Tower TM counter for 24 Battle Points. 		The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last. Dark 15
TM116 Trick Room Battle Tower – TM counter

Can be traded in the Battle Tower TM counter for 48 Battle Points. 		The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for 5 turns. Psychic 5
TM117 Fling Route 16

Found in a small area on Route 16 which can be reached by taking an underwater path on the same route. 		The user flings its held item at the target. Its power and effect depend on the item. Dark 10
TM118 Aurora Veil Blizzard City – East-most house

Given as a gift by the juggler NPC on the ground floor of the East-most house in Blizzard City. 		This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns during a hailstorm. Ice 20
TM119 Sky Drop Route 4

North of the Cinder Volcano entrance on Route 4. 		It takes the enemy into the sky where it can’t attack. The enemy is dropped on the next turn. Flying 10
TM120 Nature Power Cootes Bog

Given as a reward for completing “Protector of the Swamp.” 		An attack that changes type depending on the user’s location. Normal 20
